Package io.micronaut.http.client.bind

Interface ClientRequestBinder

All Known Subinterfaces:
AnnotatedClientArgumentRequestBinder<A>, AnnotatedClientRequestBinder<A>, ClientArgumentRequestBinder<T>, TypedClientArgumentRequestBinder<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AttributeClientRequestBinder, HeaderClientRequestBinder, QueryValueClientArgumentRequestBinder, VersionClientRequestBinder
@Indexed(ClientRequestBinder.class) public interface ClientRequestBinder
A binder that binds to a MutableHttpRequest. This class is extended by ClientArgumentRequestBinder and AnnotatedClientRequestBinder to account for different binding behaviours
Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Andriy Dmytruk
